marytts.unitselection.concat
Interface UnitConcatenator

All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseUnitConcatenator, FdpsolaUnitConcatenator, HnmUnitConcatenator, OverlapUnitConcatenator
public interface UnitConcatenator

Concatenates the units of an utterance and returns an audio stream

Author:
Marc Schröder, Anna Hunecke
